name: NBCC (India) Limited
description: NBCC (India) Limited is a premier public sector enterprise under the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, Government of India. Established in 1960, the company is primarily engaged in the business of project management consultancy, real estate development, and civil engineering. NBCC has played a significant role in the construction of residential, commercial, and institutional projects across the country, contributing to the urban infrastructure development in India. The company is known for its commitment to quality and timely delivery, making it a trusted name in the construction sector. NBCC specializes in various sectors including housing, office buildings, hospitals, and educational institutions. In addition to construction activities, the company is also involved in the rehabilitation of buildings and infrastructure projects, ensuring sustainability and modernization. With a strong focus on innovation and technology, NBCC incorporates modern construction techniques and practices to enhance efficiency and reduce costs. The company's mission is to contribute to the socio-economic development of the nation by providing affordable housing and infrastructure solutions, while also being environmentally conscious in its operations.
